TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExtendPropertySheet2

summary.span: 使管理单元组件可以将属性页添加到项的属性表中。

span.span: Enables a snap-in component to add property pages to the property sheet of an item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用 IExtendPropertySheet2 接口和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC) 的编程的详细信息，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the IExtendPropertySheet2 interface and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).

Adds pages to a property sheet.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 GetWatermarks(class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject lpIDataObject, [out] native int& lphWatermark, [out] native int& lphHeader, [out] native int& lphPalette, [out] int32& bStretch) cil managed
Public Function GetWatermarks (lpIDataObject As IDataObject, ByRef lphWatermark As IntPtr, ByRef lphHeader As IntPtr, ByRef lphPalette As IntPtr, ByRef bStretch As Integer) As Integer

public: int GetWatermarks(Microsoft::Aspnet::Snapin::IDataObject ^ lpIDataObject, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % lphWatermark, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % lphHeader, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] IntPtr % lphPalette, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % bStretch);

param.name: lpIDataObject
param.span: 包含关于范围项或结果项的上下文信息的对象上的 。

span.span: The on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.

param.name: lphWatermark
param.span: 充当 Wizard 97 页水印的位图的句柄。

span.span: The handle to a bitmap that serves as the watermark for Wizard 97 pages.

param.name: lphHeader
param.span: 充当 Wizard 97 页标头的位图的句柄。

span.span: The handle to a bitmap that serves as the header for Wizard 97 pages.

param.name: lphPalette
param.span: 用于 lphWatermark 和 lphHeader 指定的位图的调色板的句柄。

span.span: The handle to a palette used for the bitmaps specified by lphWatermark and lphHeader.

param.name: bStretch
param.span: GetWatermarks 返回值：如果应该拉伸而不是平铺水印和标头位图，则为 true；否则为 false。

span.span: A GetWatermarks return value: true if the watermark and header bitmaps should be stretched rather than tiled; otherwise, false.

summary.span: 检索以 Wizard 97 样式向导形式实现的向导表的水印和标头位图。

span.span: Retrieves the watermark and header bitmaps for wizard sheets that are implemented as Wizard 97–style wizards.

Docs.returns: | 返回值 | 说明 | | --- | --- | | etch |：如果应该拉伸而不是平铺水印和标头位图，则为 true；否则为 false。| Return Value | Description | | --- | --- | | etch | true if the watermark and header bitmaps should be stretched rather than tiled; otherwise, false. |

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 QueryPagesFor(class Microsoft.Aspnet.Snapin.IDataObject lpDataObject) cil managed
Public Function QueryPagesFor (lpDataObject As IDataObject) As Integer

param.name: lpDataObject
param.span: 一个指针，它指向包含关于范围项或结果项的上下文信息的对象上的 。

span.span: A pointer to the on the object containing context information about the scope or result item.
Determines whether the object requires pages.

Docs.returns: | 返回值 | 说明 | |--- |--- | | S\_OK | 此数据对象的属性存在。| Return value | Description | | --- | --- | | S\_OK | Properties exist for this data object. | | E\_UNEXPECTED | 发生意外错误。| | E\_UNEXPECTED | An unexpected error occurred. | | E\_INVALID | 参数无效。| | E\_INVALID | The parameter is not valid. | | 任何其他错误代码 | 没有为数据对象提供任何页面。| | Any other error code | No pages are supplied for the data object. |
